text: Carlos Michael Pinera (September 29, 1948 â€“ November 20, 2024) was an American guitarist, singer-songwriter and producer. He started his career with Blues Image. He later joined Iron Butterfly, and later formed the group Ramatam. He was the lead guitarist for Alice Cooper from 1980 to 1982. Pinera was born in Tampa, Florida. Pinera died from liver failure on November 20, 2024, at the age of 76. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Deaths from liver failure Category:American rock guitarists Category:American record producers Category:American rock singers Category:Singers from Tampa, Florida Category:American songwriters Category:Writers from Tampa, Florida
title: Mike Pinera
